title: Signing into corporate apps on a mobile device
content: [NOTE] To access company apps on a mobile device, you must download either Okta Verify or Google Authenticator to your phone. To add a mobile app to your authentication methods, please follow these instructions: Using your work laptop, log in to your Okta dashboard ( https://login.simpli.fi ) . Navigate to the Okta settings page (top right, under your name) Under ‘Security Methods’ you can setup, reset, or remove your authentication methods. Choose your desired security method and follow the instructions above. Okta FastPass is compatible with mobile devices, but it requires you to install and set up the Okta Verify app on your device first. Authentication Methods Slack Click on ‘ Sign in with workspace URL ’ Enter your sign-in URL: “ si-fi ” Click on ‘ Sign in with OKTA ’ After being redirected to Okta, input your username (full email) and password. You may encounter the ‘Choose your security method’ screen to select your authentication method, or you will be automatically redirected to your Okta Verify Push Notification or the Google Authenticator code. Accept the push notification or enter the code provided by the Google Authenticator app. [Image] Gmail Open the Gmail app. If you are already signed into your personal account, click on your profile picture and select ‘Add Another Account.’ On the ‘ Set up email ’ page, choose ‘ Google .’ Enter your full email address. You will be redirected to Okta; enter your username (your full email) again. Input your password. You may be directed to the ‘Choose your security method’ screen to select your authentication method, or you will be automatically taken to your Okta Verify Push Notification or Google Authenticator code. Accept the push notification or enter the code provided in the Google Authenticator app. Agree to Google’s terms of service. Allow a few minutes for your account to load. [Image] Zoom Launch your Zoom app and click on ‘ Sign In ’ On the following page, choose ‘ Sign in with SSO ’ Input our company domain: “ simpli-fi ” When Okta opens, enter your username (your full email address). Type in your password. You may be directed to the ‘Choose your security method’ screen to select your authentication method, or you might be automatically redirected to your Okta Verify Push Notification or the Google Authenticator code. Accept the push notification or enter the code displayed in the Google Authenticator app.
